messages.message:
Hi team,

Has anyone else seen Cypress tests fail due to either of these issues?
1. `cy.request()` failing with a 403 on this endpoint: `https://crafting-cyp--pr-{PR_NUMBER}-cypress-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/api/v2/aihub/build/projects?query_option=creator`
2. "No organization ID found" errors
Trying to figure out if it's an isolated case or something broader.

22 tests are currently failing on this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71384) due to one of the above messages :confused_psyduck:

Oh yea, somehow the user is not in any commercial org. Your PR was first created 2 weeks ago. We made a switch to the new permissions system so probably the user wasn't added to the org correctly. Looking into a fix now
Hmm... The API call actually failed, but the Cypress script doesn't throw any errors...
I fixed these users. Now all accounts should have access to the corresponding orgs.
